name: Everything Will Flow 万物皆逝
name_original: Everything Will Flow 万物皆逝
description:
Allen is an amateur photographer. In order to complete the shooting task, climbing the PinesMountain became his part of live.

Players will experience a short and fun trip in the game to accompany you through a short period of coffee time.


Game features

  • Walk simulator without any puzzle elements.
  • 2D vector horizontal version of the art style.
